translations: 恶化（worsen 的 ing 形式）；使变得更坏

sentences.sentence: The political situation is steadily worsening.
The security forces had to intervene to prevent the situation worsening.
sentences.translation: 那些安全部队不得不干预以阻止形势变得更糟。

sentences.sentence: There may actually be a worsening of credit availability to small-and medium-sized businesses in the next year or so.
sentences.translation: 在未来一年左右的时间里，中小企业信贷的可获得性实际上可能会恶化。
